subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lehigh guard C. J. McCollum, who missed most of his senior season with a broken foot, is projected to be a lottery pick in Thursday’s N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Lehigh guard C. J. McCollum, who missed most of his senior season with a broken foot, is projected to be a lottery pick in Thursday’s N.B.A. draft.
